cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Basic 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Budget dorm with storage and all bed linen included.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe Pod in a room of 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
All pods have light,USB, power and are a private haven. They are cozy with a superior mattress to guarantee a good night's rest.
Pods are in 4 and 6-bed dorms but are more private. Please request the 4-bed dorm if you have a preference.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe Pod in a room of 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: These double pod beds are for couples looking for privacy on a budget. All Bothy pods have a large deluxe duvet, power, USB, and light. Our pods are super quiet and very private.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.

specialEventConditions.title: Please read before you book our pods.
specialEventConditions.description: Deluxe Pod in a room of 4 Bed Mixed Dorm are in 4 and 6-bed dorms but are more private. Please request the 4-bed dorm if you have a preference. No refund applies if you do not inform in advance about the special request.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 25th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 25th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
